title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
subtitle: Illustrated Edition with Original Watercolor Art
author: Carlo Collodi
description: A beautifully illustrated edition of Carlo Collodi's beloved masterpiece. Follow Pinocchio's adventures from wooden puppet to real boy, brought to life with stunning European watercolor illustrations in the classic Italian tradition. This edition features 12 original artworks capturing the magic, humor, and heart of this timeless story.
